<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This StreamRef might refer to a smaller window over a larger stream.  In</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that case we will have read out more bytes than we should return, because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
